title: Giants of Rome (1964 Peplum) The Glory of the Roman Empire’s is in their hands

sources.title: Giants of Rome (1964 Peplum) The Glory of the Roman Empire’s is in their hands
sources.description:
In 52 B.C., fearless Roman centurion Claudius Marcellus (Richard Harrison) leads a daring team, including the strongman Germanicus (Ralph Hudson) and skilled fighter Castor (Ettore Manni), on a high-stakes mission to infiltrate enemy lines and destroy a deadly Druidic catapult threatening Caesar's forces. Facing relentless traps, brutal foes, and impossible odds, the group must outwit the cunning Vercingetorix (Renato Baldini) to secure victory for Rome.

Original title: I giganti di Roma (1964)


Main cast:
Richard Harrison - Claudius Marcellus
Wandisa Guida - Livilla
Ettore Manni - Castor
Philippe Hersent - Drusus
Ralph Hudson - Germanicus

Directed by Antonio Margheriti
Genres: Adventure, Adventure, History, War, Peplum
Release date: September 10, 1964 (Italy)
Filming location: Italy


French audio version: https://youtu.be/78zAkfC9RXg

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdbG3qWIWu2HZkdI6nJCWaqj
